title: Major General’s Smart and Gorgeous Wife - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Josei   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Carefree Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Military   Power Couple   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests
author: 银狐小音
description:
With a marriage contract forcefully done, he married her, and all she could do was comply, and resent him deeply for that and for all the following misunderstandings they faced.

However, it was already too late when she understood she actually loved him.

Fortunately, after a life of misfortunes, she was reborn to the very beginning, the day he told her they were married, and she was determined to cherish him in her second life!

Lin Mu Mu’s life goal is to : grow flowers and plants, and take care of Yun Ting.

Yun Ting’s life principles are : Love Lin Mumu, Love Lin Mumu, Love Lin Mumu!>
